title: fps/ping spikes getting out of hand

embed.description: February 3rd, 2011 by Dragos M. | Filed under Uncategorized. Thank you for your bug reports and feature requests. Portable Apps is a complete, free and very useful collection of portable applications. Go get all the cool Open Source apps on an USB stick, WinMTR included!

replies.body:
Even though your connection may be 100%, when you go into team fights (or any other time there is a lot of stuff going on at once) your connection can take a dip. This happens because it's harder to process all the stuff going on at once. Go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure you have a stable connection.

Let me know if you're still having issues after that.

Thank you for your help!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
  I know you get a lot of emails about patch issues and there isn't always a quick solution, so 
I looked through the Trouble Shooting Guide; you gave me the link to, but not even 
a wired connection is not stopping the issue. 
My firewall and packet data don't seem to be an issue and it isn't a DNS or Proxy problem.
I'm still at a loss as to the cause,
 i think the new patch is causing some frustration to the League Servers.{{champion:32}}

It sounds like you've already done a great deal of troubleshooting on your end, so your issue might be something veeeeeery specific. I'd like for us to be able to look at your issue one on one, so reach out to our tech guys in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

They'll be able to go much more in depth for you!

You do realize a huge amount of users are having this issue due to 7.5 patch? It is not from our side. 

I go from 235 fps to 60-80? Please don't tell me to check your connection guide lol. Fix your damn patch already.
